alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 15 at 2:22AM PST until December 16 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SATURDAY FOR LADD AND PYLES CANYONS... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 to 50 mph expected for Ladd and Pyles Canyons. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...From 4 AM Friday to 10 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and create cross-wind issues for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
